World.Name: Cole
World.Entry:
December, 1050: Cole understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals January, 1051: Cole can track the animals in the area February, 1051: Cole: Hi Samantha Samantha: Hi Cole! Mum sent me to tell you to do some chores around the farm instead of just relaxing all the time. If you want though, we could sneak off and go play instead! Cole: I'll think on it - you always were a bad influence on me Samantha: Hey - that's what sisters are for!
February, 1051: Cole does nothing all month
